instruction: Consider this situation. Customer is ready to pay $13 for my product but we are not able to raise invoice for less than $20. So in this situation, act like a top sales person & closing expert & give me an email copy to upsell this customer with another $13 product so that it can create a win win situation.
output:
Subject: Exciting Opportunity: Enhance Your Experience with Another Must-Have Product!

Dear [Customer's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. We truly appreciate your interest in our product and your willingness to make a purchase. We understand that you're ready to pay $13, and we're delighted to have the opportunity to serve you.

However, we have a policy in place that prevents us from raising an invoice for an amount less than $20. This policy is designed to ensure that we can continue to provide the highest quality products and services to our valued customers.

In light of this, I'd like to propose an exciting opportunity to enhance your experience and receive even more value from our offerings. We have another product that is also priced at $13 and is a perfect complement to the one you're currently interested in. 

This additional product, [Product Name], offers [briefly describe the additional product's features and benefits]. It's a fantastic opportunity to expand your experience with our brand and enjoy the benefits of both products at an exclusive discount.

Here's how we can proceed:

1. We will add the second product to your order at no extra cost, thanks to our special promotion.
2. The total amount for the order will now be $20, which aligns with our invoicing policy.
3. You will receive two high-quality products for the price of one, providing you with exceptional value for your money.

By taking advantage of this offer, you'll not only be able to purchase the product you initially intended but also gain the benefits of the additional product, all while supporting a business that values your satisfaction and long-term relationship.

Please let us know if you're interested in this offer by replying to this email. We're here to help and look forward to providing you with an exceptional customer experience.

Thank you for considering this opportunity, and we hope to hear from you soon.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Position]
[Your Contact Information]
